name: Civiquo Limited
goal:
CiviQuo is the worldâ€™s first alternative residency and citizenship e-marketplace.

The platform brings together a large selection of programmes and service providers from around the world, enabling each to showcase their offering in a very simple, transparent and straightforward manner. Furthermore, it puts in place a standardised on-boarding process, making use of cutting-edge due diligence tools.

Individuals interested in RCBI programmes do not need to browse through many different sites to find relevant information but can use CiviQuo as a resource to find information on programmes and service providers. A key feature of CiviQuo is that service providers who feature on the website need to disclose the professional fees that they charge.

Once clients have filed their RCBI on-boarding request, they can also rate the service provider used, thus democratising the industry. CiviQuo brings a new transparent formula that eases the process for individuals and transforms the way agents market themselves.
interests: Borders and Security, Foreign affairs and security policy, Fraud prevention, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: All activity related to Investor Citizenship and Residence Schemes within the EU, and also outside of the EU.
